email_or_phone_not_exist: This email or phone number does not exist. If you are not yet registered, click on 'New Account'
account_exists_different_method: An account already exists with this email address, but was created using a different method. Please log in using the {{Methode}} for this email address. If you are having trouble logging in or if you are unsure of the method used, please contact our support for assistance.
please_enter_a_valid_phone_number: Please enter a valid phone number!
please_enter_the_code: Please enter the code received by SMS at the phone number
cant_find_the_message: If you can't find the message, make sure to check your phone.
incorrect_code: Incorrect code, please verify the code
first_name_for_drivers: Your first name will be for your drivers, your last name is only for your invoices.
by_continuing_i_accept: By continuing I accept the terms of use of Taxi Coq and acknowledge having read its privacy policy.
accept_terms: Please accept our terms of use
enter_full_name: Please enter your first and last name!
terms_and_privacy: By continuing I accept the terms of use of Taxi Coq and acknowledge having read its privacy policy.
enter_valid_phone_number: Please enter a valid phone number!
customize_your_journey: Customize your journey from A to B and beyond with our user-friendly app. Choose your main destination effortlessly, and if your route involves detours, easily add intermediate stops along the way. With us, planning your trip is in your hands, ensuring a bespoke taxi booking experience, without complications.
ready_to_go: Ready to Go? Wait for Your Taxi in Complete Peace
after_booking: After booking your taxi, let us take over. Track your driver's approach in real time on our integrated map, receive real-time notifications, and be alerted as soon as your taxi approaches. No more unnecessary stress. Our system guarantees a hassle-free wait, allowing you to focus on what's important.
taxi_arrived: Your Taxi Has Arrived, Ready to Embark
moment_you_have_been_waiting_for: The moment you have been waiting for is finally here: your taxi is at your doorstep. Quickly identify your driver with the clear details displayed in the app, and get ready to embark on a most pleasant journey.
order_on_taxi_coq_website: Order on the Taxi Coq website
how_can_i_help_you_today: How can I help you today?
feel_free_to_ask_questions: Feel free to ask questions or request assistance.
logOutConfirmation: Are you sure you want to log out?
selectedDateIsPast: The selected date is earlier than the current time.
taxiCoqAccessRequest: Taxi Coq needs access to your location
locationPermissionExplanation: To set the arrival address to your current position, we need your permission to access location. You can enable location in the application settings.
enableLocationServicesInstruction: Please enable location services in Settings

optionsAddInfo: You can add the options you need.
confirm_delete_ride: Do you want to delete this ride?
confirm_cancel_ride: Do you want to cancel this ride?
privacy_policy: We ensure the security and confidentiality of the information we hold. Only authorized persons have access to this information.
confirm_logout: Are you sure you want to log out?
confirm_deactivate_account: Do you want to deactivate your account?
cant_find_answers: Can't find answers to your questions? You can always
how_to_book_taxi: How can I book a taxi?
book_taxi_instructions: To book a taxi, open the app, enter your current location and destination, then press 'Book'. You can also specify additional details, such as the type of vehicle.
how_long_taxi_arrives: How long does it take for a taxi to arrive?
taxi_arrival_time: The waiting time depends on the availability of taxis in your area. Generally, we strive to send you a taxi within 10 to 15 minutes of your booking.
cancel_booking_info: Yes, you can cancel your booking at any time before the taxi arrives. However, cancellation fees may apply depending on the cancellation timeframe.
payment_methods: We accept payments in cash and by credit card. You can add a card to your account for hassle-free payment.
book_taxi_for_later: Can I book a taxi for a later date?
how_to_schedule_ride: Yes, you can schedule a booking for a later date and time. Simply specify the desired date and time during the booking.
schedule_ride_instructions: Go to the app, choose the option to book for a later date, select the date and time of your pickup.
confirm_your_booking: Make sure to confirm the booking once all information is entered.
cancel_booking_steps: To cancel, use the cancellation option available in the app. If you encounter any difficulties, contact customer service directly.
choose_pickup_date_time: Choose the date and time of your pickup.
choose_booking_option_for_later: Choose the booking option for a later date.
to_cancel_use_app_option: To cancel, use the cancellation option available in the app.
if_issues_contact_support: If you encounter any issues, contact customer service directly.
start_adding_saved_places: Start adding your saved places to access them more quickly.
tracking_permission_required: You need to enable tracking in the app settings to watch ads.
taxicoq_credit: TaxiCoq credit usable for your rides!
you_have_earned: üéâ You have earned {{amount}} TaxiCoq Credit Point.
check_balance: Check the integrity of your balance in your personal space (payment section).
where_to_go: Where do you want to go? Please enter your destination address so we can arrange your ride
need_location_permission_to_send_ride: To send a ride from your current location, we need your permission to access the location. You can enable location in the app settings or enter your address manually.
please_enable_location_services: Please enable location services in Settings
why_cancel_ride: Why do you want to cancel your ride?
error_during_cancellation: Error during cancellation of the mission
finalize_booking_payment_instruction:
To finalize your booking and proceed with payment, please click on the 'Payment Space' button to add your credit card. Your ride will only be confirmed after the payment information is added.
 Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

ordered_by_accident: I ordered the ride by accident
are_you_sure_quit: Are you sure you want to quit?
next_time_easy_login: Next time you log in on this device, you will just need to tap your account
booking_success: We are pleased to confirm that your taxi booking has been successfully accepted. Your ride is scheduled for
tell_us_about_your_ride: Tell us how your ride went by rating your driver. Your feedback is crucial for continuously improving our service.
